Crypto Portal is an app for enthusiasts or traders, who want to be up to date with the latest events, trends or news around bitcoin. The application scans all sources of crypto news: social media, video channels, breaking news channels, altcoin events and web articles, all in real time.
In Crypto Portal you can find : 
 
 "•" List of the upcoming altcoin events. 
 "•" Keyword trends for altcoins and bitcoin. 
 "•" Greed and fear index. 
 "•" Aggregated channel for breaking news or announcements. 
 "•" Constant stream of all tweets, containing crypto keywords, filtered by number of followers. 
 "•" Monitor the social media accounts of the top cryptocurrencies for announcements or partnerships. 
 "•" Live list of the latest, top crypto videos. 
 "•" Top crypto web articles from the last hours. 
 "•" Price deviation from whole crypto sector. 
 "•" Engagement deviation for tweets from altcoin accounts. 
 "•" Alarms so you never miss an important event.
